tasks.task: Conducting a season-at-a-glance review of strawberry pests and their management.
subtasks: Discussing pests and their activities during various strawberry growth stages (e.g., cutworms and aphids in the transplant stage, spider mites and thrips in winter, etc.).
Presenting management options for pests during different seasons (e.g., spray for cutworms, miticide options for spider mites, etc.).

tasks.task: Detailing pest management for two spotted spider mites.
subtasks: Describing the lifecycle and feeding behavior of two spotted spider mites.
Explaining monitoring techniques and thresholds for spider mite infestations.
Listing management options including chemical and biological control methods.

tasks.task: Discussing sap beetles and their management.
subtasks: Describing sap beetle feeding habits and damage.
Suggesting cultural control methods (e.g., bait buckets) and other strategies.

tasks.task: Presenting information on the chili thrip pest.
subtasks: Describing the damage caused by chili thrips in strawberries.
Outlining control options including insecticides and other treatments.

tasks.task: In-depth exploration of spotted wing drosophila management.
subtasks: Discussing the invasive nature and impact of spotted wing drosophila on strawberry crops.
Presenting monitoring techniques and trap setups.
Detailing control strategies including chemical, biological, behavioral, and cultural methods.

tasks.task: Highlighting pollinator health considerations in strawberry production.
subtasks: Discussing the importance of pollinators in strawberry yield and quality.
Recommending best practices for maintaining pollinator health.

tasks.task: Promoting resources for strawberry pest management.
subtasks: Sharing the Southeast Small Fruit Consortium IPM guide and IPM app as valuable references.
